description:
Provides an Alicloud Function Compute Trigger resource. Based on trigger, execute your code in response to events in Alibaba Cloud.
 For information about Service and how to use it, see [What is Function Compute](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/52895.htm).

-> **NOTE:** The resource requires a provider field 'account_id'. [See account_id](https://www.terraform.io/docs/providers/alicloud/index.html#account_id).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Config.description: The config of Function Compute trigger.It is valid when `type` is not "mns_topic".See [Configure triggers and events](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/70140.htm) for more details.

ConfigMns.description: The config of Function Compute trigger when the type is "mns_topic".It is conflict with `config`.

Name.description: The Function Compute trigger name. It is the only in one service and is conflict with "name_prefix".

NamePrefix.description: Setting a prefix to get a only trigger name. It is conflict with "name".

Role.description: RAM role arn attached to the Function Compute trigger. Role used by the event source to call the function. The value format is "acs:ram::$account-id:role/$role-name". See [Create a trigger](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/53102.htm) for more details.

SourceArn.description: Event source resource address. See [Create a trigger](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/53102.htm) for more details.

Type.description: The Type of the trigger. Valid values: ["oss", "log", "timer", "http", "mns_topic", "cdn_events"].
